radiographic_examinations.findings: Caution for left lower lobe pneumonia.
No acute intra-abdominal process. The pancreas is normal in attenuation with no peripancreatic fat stranding or pancreatic ductal dilatation.

Small right pleural effusion. A 1.2 x 2.0 x 1.5 cm cyst in the right lobe of the liver, unchanged compared to prior CT. Mildly distended gallbladder with irregular echogenic material likely representing sludge balls/tumefactive sludge.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Cyst unchanged compared to prior CT.
